author: A_Brickset_user
title: Nice, but could have been better
review: A nice little set. The little details are great (refrigeration grill and chrome front grill). Downside is the wheels stick out of the sides too far. They should have used different wheel axle, but this can be modified fairly easily. Also, the sticker for the minifig is a hastle.

author: hustla187
title: not a bad set
review: This is a great town set to own and enjoy. The truck looks great and since it has an actual milk company's name on it, it looks way better. The minifig and the dolly look even better with the truck! Definitely a must own.
